TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XamlTypeInvoker extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一个扩展点，该扩展点可通过除反射和构造函数之外的其他技术来构造 XAML 类型的实例。

span.span: Provides an extension point that can construct instances of a XAML type through techniques other than reflection and constructors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目的是一个可扩展的 XAML 类型系统、 架构和一个有效的运行时不依赖于完全 CLR 功能，例如 CLR 特性，通过反射信息能够和，依次类推。The purpose of is to enable an extensible XAML type system, schema, and a working run time that does not rely as fully on CLR features such as CLR attributes, reflection information through and , and so on. 子类用作输入参数的 XAML 架构类的备用构造函数如。Subclasses of are used as input parameters for the alternate constructors of XAML schema classes such as . 创建子类，并将传递通过向基构造函数。You subclass and pass the through to the base constructor. 以及定义的构造函数中，你还必须提供替代至少一部分`Lookup`方法的。Along with defining a for the constructor, you must also provide overrides for at least some of the `Lookup` methods of . 具有默认实现。 has a default implementation. 默认实现遵循类似的模型的默认实现的 XAML 架构类型到并: CLR 类型系统用于实例化、 值和查找操作，包括使用 CLR 属性和，依次类推。The default implementation follows a similar model to the default implementation of XAML schema types and : the CLR type system is used for instantiation, values and lookups, including using CLR attributes, and , and so on. 提供基本实例化的方法 () 和相关的类型的方法，表示集合、 字典或数组 (;;;;). provides methods for basic instantiation () and methods that are relevant for types where the represents a collection, dictionary or array (; ; ; ; ).

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.para: 基实现包括调用内部帮助程序ThrowIfUnknown。此帮助器的情况下总是会引发位置基于未知，其中包括事例的是。在内部，基实现调用，如果结果是，则引发。基实现不一定使用其自己实现。首先，将强制转换到尝试。如果成功，调用进行并且该方法返回。否则，基实现将使用 CLR来调用基础方法，如通过调用获取此。在此级别的基实现中引发任何异常是。仍有可能，基础方法将引发异常时调用。可使用其他运行的时异常如果不返回有效的结果。

The base implementation includes a call to the internal helper ThrowIfUnknown. This helper always throws for cases where a is based on an unknown , which includes cases where the of the is . Internally, the base implementation calls , and throws if the result is . The base implementation does not necessarily use its own implementation. First, a cast of to is attempted. If this succeeds, a call to is made and the method returns. Otherwise, the base implementation uses CLR to invoke the underlying method, as obtained from a call to for this . In the base implementation no exception is raised at this level if is . It is still possible that the underlying method will raise an exception when invoked. Other run time exceptions are possible if does not return a valid result.

The base implementation includes a call to the internal helper ThrowIfUnknown. This helper always throws for cases where a is based on an unknown , which includes cases where the of the is . Internally, the base implementation calls , and throws if the result is . The base implementation does not necessarily use its own implementation. First, a cast of to is attempted. If this succeeds, a call to is made and the method returns. Otherwise, the base implementation uses CLR to invoke the underlying method, as obtained from a call to for this . In the base implementation no exception is raised at this level if or are . It is still possible that the underlying method will raise an exception when invoked. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法应返回`null`的情况下，此不是可写集合或字典。This method should return `null` for cases where the for this is not a writeable collection or dictionary. 具体而言，应返回`null`的情况下，返回`None`。Specifically, should return `null` for cases where returns `None`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果你没有访问完全受信任的 XAML 类型系统，此方法有可能对报告虚假向调用方的信息。If you are not accessing a fully trusted XAML type system, this method has the potential to report false information to callers.

span.span: is .

span.para: 基实现返回的情况下，基于未知，其中包括事例的是。它还会返回如果是。XAML 集合可能有多个方法，因为 XAML 集合可能可以支持多个内容类型 (请参阅，或参阅了解这一概念在 WPF 中的一种实现)。默认实现使用内部逻辑，返回根据签名和所提供的类型的最佳匹配项。

The base implementation returns for cases where a is based on an unknown , which includes cases where the of the is . It also returns if is . XAML collections potentially have more than one method, because a XAML collection can potentially support more than one content type (see , or see for information about one implementation of this concept in WPF). The default implementation uses internal logic to return the best match based on the signatures and the type of the supplied .
